biz.sudden.baseAndUtility.service
Interface ScopeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScopeServiceImpl
public interface ScopeService

Associations and Occurrence of Topics are only visible within a certain scope. This service manages the scopes. Scopes are not used for security. Each occurrence and association has only one scope (due to otherwise expected performance deterioration). Currently 4 types of Scopes are envisioned: - Organisation - BusinessOpportunity - Unspecified (not Org. and not BO) - RetrieveAll (see all occurrences, and associations; might only be used when retrieving)

Author:
gweich
